ygData.subject: RE: Another take on twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: That cloak rules big time where do you get it and what mob drops it? Kaladiel 20th Lvl (just made last night) Brell ... From: Dave Gaines
ygData.messageBody:
That cloak rules big time where do you get it and what mob drops it?

Kaladiel
20th Lvl (just made last night)
Brell

-----Original Message-----
From: Dave Gaines [mailto:dave@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 8:22 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Another take on twinking


From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>

Cloak of Flames:

AC10
Dex +9 Agi +9 HP:+50 SV_FIRE + 15
Haste
Weight 0.1

Usable by All/All

Another would be the cloak of the shadows, AC12, dex+13 etc.

but both of these are usable by all, I can't find
any type of blood cloak.
>
> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>
> Is there a special cloak for monks only, my friend was telling me about it
> yesterday. He said it was a blood something I think, anybody heard about
> this?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jeff Bleich [mailto:dolph@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 8:09 AM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Another take on twinking
>

>
> When you think about it Journey men boots are no DROp...it would be close
to
> imposible to get them at level 6.......meaning he must of had 5 level 50
's
> walk with him down thier and they let him loot it
